python_source: def f(init, xs): return lax.scan(lambda c, x: (c * 0.9 + x * 0.1, c), init, xs)
jaxpr:
{ lambda ; a:f32[4] b:f32[8,4]. let
    c:f32[4] d:f32[8,4] = scan[
      _split_transpose=False
      jaxpr={ lambda ; e:f32[4] f:f32[4]. let
          g:f32[4] = mul e 0.8999999761581421:f32[]
          h:f32[4] = mul f 0.10000000149011612:f32[]
          i:f32[4] = add g h
        in (i, e) }
      length=8
      linear=(False, False)
      num_carry=1
      num_consts=0
      reverse=False
      unroll=1
    ] a b
  in (c, d) }

module @jit_fn attributes {mhlo.num_partitions = 1 : i32, mhlo.num_replicas = 1 : i32} {
  func.func public @main(%arg0: tensor<4xf32>, %arg1: tensor<8x4xf32>) -> (tensor<4xf32> {jax.result_info = "result[0]"}, tensor<8x4xf32> {jax.result_info = "result[1]"}) {
    %cst = stablehlo.constant dense<0.000000e+00> : tensor<f32>
    %0 = stablehlo.broadcast_in_dim %cst, dims = [] : (tensor<f32>) -> tensor<8x4xf32>
    %c = stablehlo.constant dense<0> : tensor<i32>
    %1:4 = stablehlo.while(%iterArg = %arg1, %iterArg_0 = %c, %iterArg_1 = %arg0, %iterArg_2 = %0) : tensor<8x4xf32>, tensor<i32>, tensor<4xf32>, tensor<8x4xf32>
    cond {
      %c_3 = stablehlo.constant dense<8> : tensor<i32>
      %2 = stablehlo.compare  LT, %iterArg_0, %c_3,  SIGNED : (tensor<i32>, tensor<i32>) -> tensor<i1>
      stablehlo.return %2 : tensor<i1>
    } do {
      %c_3 = stablehlo.constant dense<0> : tensor<i32>
      %2 = stablehlo.dynamic_slice %iterArg, %iterArg_0, %c_3, sizes = [1, 4] : (tensor<8x4xf32>, tensor<i32>, tensor<i32>) -> tensor<1x4xf32>
      %3 = stablehlo.reshape %2 : (tensor<1x4xf32>) -> tensor<4xf32>
      %4:2 = func.call @closed_call(%iterArg_1, %3) : (tensor<4xf32>, tensor<4xf32>) -> (tensor<4xf32>, tensor<4xf32>)
      %5 = stablehlo.broadcast_in_dim %4#1, dims = [1] : (tensor<4xf32>) -> tensor<1x4xf32>
      %c_4 = stablehlo.constant dense<0> : tensor<i32>
      %6 = stablehlo.dynamic_update_slice %iterArg_2, %5, %iterArg_0, %c_4 : (tensor<8x4xf32>, tensor<1x4xf32>, tensor<i32>, tensor<i32>) -> tensor<8x4xf32>
      %c_5 = stablehlo.constant dense<1> : tensor<i32>
      %7 = stablehlo.add %iterArg_0, %c_5 : tensor<i32>
      stablehlo.return %iterArg, %7, %4#0, %6 : tensor<8x4xf32>, tensor<i32>, tensor<4xf32>, tensor<8x4xf32>
    }
    return %1#2, %1#3 : tensor<4xf32>, tensor<8x4xf32>
  }
  func.func private @closed_call(%arg0: tensor<4xf32>, %arg1: tensor<4xf32>) -> (tensor<4xf32>, tensor<4xf32>) {
    %cst = stablehlo.constant dense<0.899999976> : tensor<f32>
    %0 = stablehlo.broadcast_in_dim %cst, dims = [] : (tensor<f32>) -> tensor<4xf32>
    %1 = stablehlo.multiply %arg0, %0 : tensor<4xf32>
    %cst_0 = stablehlo.constant dense<1.000000e-01> : tensor<f32>
    %2 = stablehlo.broadcast_in_dim %cst_0, dims = [] : (tensor<f32>) -> tensor<4xf32>
    %3 = stablehlo.multiply %arg1, %2 : tensor<4xf32>
    %4 = stablehlo.add %1, %3 : tensor<4xf32>
    return %4, %arg0 : tensor<4xf32>, tensor<4xf32>
  }
}
